tit.cmt: (京都府) を追加しました。

sen.j: 北山駅（きたやまえき）は、京都府京都市北区 (京都市)にある、京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Kitayama Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
sen.cmt: ”（京都市）”は余分のように思われますので、訳してありません。
sen.e: Kitayama Station, located in Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Kitayama Station, located in Kita Ward (Kyoto City), Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto Municipal Subway.
sen.cmt: (京都市) を追加しました。City →municipal としました。

sen.j: 駅番号はK03。
sen.e: The station number is K03.
The station number is K03.
The station number is K03.

sen.j: 駅名は、東西方向に走る通りである北山通に由来する。
sen.e: The station is named after Kitayama-dori Street running in the east-west direction.
The station is named after Kitayama-dori Street, which runs in the east-west direction.
The station is named after Kitayama-dori Street, which runs in the east-west direction.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: プラットホーム1面2線の地下駅。
sen.e: This station is located underground, with a platform serving tw tracks.
This station is situated underground, with a platform serving two tracks.
This station is situated underground, with a platform serving two tracks.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみ。
sen.e: Only one entrance/exit gate place is provided.
Only one entrance/exit gate place is provided.
Only one ticket gate is provided.
sen.cmt: 改札→ticket gate としました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 1970年代以前は田園地帯だったこの地域は、新しい建物が多い。
sen.e: This district was a rural area in the 1970s and before, and threfore, many of the houses there is new.
This district was a rural area through to the 1970s, so many of the houses there are new.
This district was a rural area until the 1970s, so many of the houses there are new.

sen.j: 駅近辺に著名な建築家による建造物が集中している。
sen.e: Buildings designed by famous archtests concentrate in the vicinity of this station.
Buildings designed by famous architects concentrate in the vicinity of this station.
Buildings designed by famous architects concentrate in the vicinity of this station.

sen.j: かつてこの駅付近にあったα-stationも同様である。
sen.e: The α-station once located near to this station is one of such buildings.
The α-station once located nearby is one such building.
The α-station once located nearby is one such building.

sen.j: 北山通（きたやまどおり）
sen.e: Kitayama-dori Street
Kitayama-dori Street
Kitayama-dori Street

sen.j: 京都府立植物園
sen.e: The Kyoto Botanical Garden
The Kyoto Botanical Garden
The Kyoto Botanical Garden

sen.j: 京都府立総合資料館
sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural Library and Archives
Kyoto Prefectural Library and Archives
Kyoto Prefectural Library and Archives

sen.j: 京都府立陶板名画の庭（安藤忠雄設計）
sen.e: Garden of Fine Art, Kyoto (desinged by Tadao ANDO)
Garden of Fine Art, Kyoto (designed by Tadao ANDO)
Garden of Fine Art, Kyoto (designed by Tadao ANDO)

sen.j: 京都コンサートホール（磯崎新設計）
sen.e: Kyoto Concert Hall (designed by Arata ISOZAKI)
Kyoto Concert Hall (designed by Arata ISOZAKI)
Kyoto Concert Hall (designed by Arata ISOZAKI)

sen.j: 京都府立大学
sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural University
Kyoto Prefectural University
Kyoto Prefectural University

sen.j: シンタックスビル（高松伸設計）
sen.e: "Syntax" Building (designed by Shin TAKAMATSU)
"Syntax" Building (designed by Shin TAKAMATSU)
"Syntax" Building (designed by Shin TAKAMATSU)

sen.j: 1990年（平成2年）10月24日 烏丸線北山-北大路間延伸時に開業。
sen.e: October 24, 1990: Operation of this station started when the extended "Kitayam - Kitaoji" portion of the Karasuma Line started its operation.
October 24, 1990: This station became active when the extended "Kitayama - Kitaoji" portion of the Karasuma Line started its operation.
October 24, 1990: This station became active when the extended portion between Kitayama and Kitaoji of the Karasuma Line started its operation.
sen.cmt: 一部翻訳を変更しました。

sen.j: 当時は起点駅であった。
sen.e: At that time, this station was a terminal.
At that time, the station was a terminal.
At that time, the station was a terminal.

sen.j: 1997年（平成9年）6月3日 国際会館-北山間延伸により、途中駅となる。
sen.e: June 3, 1997: Operation between Kokusai Kaikan Station and Kitayam Station started, and this station became a non-terminal one.
June 3, 1997: Operation between Kokusaikaikan Station and Kitayam Station started, and this station became a non-terminal one.
June 3, 1997: Operation between Kokusai Kaikan Station and Kitayama Station started, and this station became a way station.
sen.cmt: 一部翻訳を変更しました。

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: April 1, 2007, PiTaPa became usable.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became accepted.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became accepted.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄
sen.e: Kyoto City Subway
Kyoto City Subway
Kyoto Municipal Subway

sen.e: ■ Karasuma Line

sen.j: 松ヶ崎駅_(京都府)(K02) - 北山駅(K03) - 北大路駅(K04)
sen.e: Matsugasaki Station (located in kyoto Prefecture) (K02) - Kitayama Station (K03) - Kitaoji Station (K04)
Matsugasaki Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) (K02) - Kitayama Station (K03) - Kitaoji Station (K04)
